suggest.illuminate/filesystem: Required to use the composer class (5.2.*).
suggest.jeremeamia/superclosure: Required to be able to serialize closures (~2.2).
suggest.paragonie/random_compat: Provides a compatible interface like PHP7's random_bytes() in PHP 5 projects (~1.1).
suggest.symfony/polyfill-php56: Required to use the hash_equals function on PHP 5.5 (~1.0).
suggest.symfony/process: Required to use the composer class (2.8.*|3.0.*).
